Technique: BURNED, OXIDIZED; ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED; ENGRAVED
Name: Bowl
Description: Semispherical bowl with wide mouth, rounded rim, curved walls and stable base. Paste of a reddish colour and remnants of a white-yellowish coating on the interior and exterior surface. On the rim we find a painted decoration: a band of a dark red colour, framed by a black line (above) and a groove (below), encircling the entire piece.
